resources.string: My return was picked up but I haven\'t received my refund yet
Refund will be initiated after we receive the item and it passes the quality check. It may take 1 to 5 buisness days.
MY PAYMENT HAS BEEN DEBITED MULTIPLE TIMES
We are sorry that your payment got debited multiple times. The extra amount debited from your bank/card account will be automatically refunded.
MY BANK ACCOUNT DETAILS FOR REFUND

If you have recieved E-mail/SMS from us regarding refund processing. please send us the following details to process your refund as the earlier bank details which were shared by you might be incorrect.
I AM UNABLE TO LOGIN TO MY ACCOUNT
You can recover your password using the \'Forgot Password\' link in the login page. If you are still unable to access your account, then please call our customer care.
I AM UNABLE TO APPLY COUPON
You can apply a coupon on a cart page before you place an order.
I WANT TO UNSUBSCRIBE FROM PROMOTIONAL EMAILS AND SMS
To unsubscribe from promotional SMSes please email us.
Sorry! We are not able to recommend a solution. Please email us.
